@Wasatchbay @GrouchPotato20 @utahjazz So that is where the luxury tax goes! All the luxury tax pay their tax into a pot. Then that pot gets paid to all the other non tax teams. 

So say there are 8 tax teams who all pay between $1 and $10 totaling $44. Then that $44 gets split to the other 22 teams for $2 each.
